\w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath given \w us|strong="G1722"\w* most \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w promises|strong="G1862"\w*: \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w partakers|strong="G2844"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w divine|strong="G2304"\w* \w nature|strong="G5449"\w*: flying \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w corruption|strong="G5356"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* concupiscence \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, employing \w all|strong="G3956"\w* care, minister \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, virtue; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* virtue, \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*;

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* abound, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2962"\w* \w make|strong="G3756"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* empty \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w unfruitful|strong="G0175"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* hath \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w with|strong="G0846"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w and|strong="G0846"\w* groping, having forgotten \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* purged \w from|strong="G3361"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* old \w sins|strong="G0265"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, labour \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w*, \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* good works \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w sure|strong="G0949"\w* \w your|strong="G4160"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w election|strong="G1589"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* sin \w at|strong="G3588"\w* \w any|strong="G3756"\w* \w time|strong="G4218"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w entrance|strong="G1529"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* ministered \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w abundantly|strong="G4146"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* everlasting \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Saviour \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G4012"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* cause \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G3195"\w* begin \w to|strong="G3195"\w* put \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w always|strong="G0104"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w remembrance|strong="G5279"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*: \w though|strong="G2532"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3778"\w* confirmed \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w present|strong="G3778"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* think \w it|strong="G2233"\w* meet \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w long|strong="G3745"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4638"\w*, \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w stir|strong="G1326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* up \w by|strong="G1722"\w* putting \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* remembrance.

\w Being|strong="G1510"\w* assured \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w laying|strong="G0595"\w* away \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4638"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G3588"\w* hand, according \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath signified \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G3778"\w* endeavour, \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* frequently \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* decease, whereby \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G4160"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* memory \w of|strong="G2192"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* following artificial \w fables|strong="G3454"\w*, \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w known|strong="G1107"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w presence|strong="G3952"\w* \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w eyewitnesses|strong="G2030"\w* \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w greatness|strong="G3168"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, honour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*: \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* coming down \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* excellent \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*: \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G5259"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w*; hear ye \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w mount|strong="G3735"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w more|strong="G0949"\w* \w firm|strong="G0949"\w* prophetical \w word|strong="G3056"\w*: whereunto \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* attend, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w light|strong="G5316"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* shineth \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* dark \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* dawn, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w star|strong="G5459"\w* arise \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*:

Understanding \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1097"\w* private \w interpretation|strong="G1955"\w*.
